name: MTLCounterResultStageUtilization
desc: The result from sampling a stage-utilization counter set.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Initializes a default stage utilization result.

items.name: init(totalCycles: UInt64, vertexCycles: UInt64, tessellationCycles: UInt64, postTessellationVertexCycles: UInt64, fragmentCycles: UInt64, renderTargetCycles: UInt64)
items.desc: Initializes a stage utilization result with predetermined values.

items.name: var totalCycles: UInt64
items.desc: The total number of cycles spent in the render pass.

items.name: var vertexCycles: UInt64
items.desc: The number of cycles spent running vertex shaders.

items.name: var tessellationCycles: UInt64
items.desc: The number of cycles spent tessellating patches.

items.name: var postTessellationVertexCycles: UInt64
items.desc: The number of cycles spent running post-tessellation vertex shaders.

items.name: var fragmentCycles: UInt64
items.desc: The number of cycles spent running fragment shaders.

items.name: var renderTargetCycles: UInt64
items.desc: The number of cycles spent writing data to render targets.
